displayName: Checkout counts for all books in course reserves
description: Modified version of Lev's function Created by Michael for all course reserves.
instructions: Enter date range to count circulations. Optionally filter by course codes or exclude specific course types. Leave fields blank to include all courses and all time periods.

parameters.name: course_code_filter
parameters.displayName: Filter by course codes (comma-separated, e.g., MATH101,ENG202)

parameters.name: exclusion_filter
parameters.displayName: Exclude course types (comma-separated: POP, LAW, NEW, EMPTY)
